# DynamicFolio CMS
> A dynamic portfolio CMS built with Next.js 16, Supabase, and Tailwind CSS.

## Core Files
- [src/app/page.tsx](file:///c:/Others/proj/New_Portfolio/src/app/page.tsx): Main entry point (Home).
- [src/app/admin/page.tsx](file:///c:/Others/proj/New_Portfolio/src/app/admin/page.tsx): Admin dashboard entry.
- [src/lib/stores/](file:///c:/Others/proj/New_Portfolio/src/lib/stores/): Zustand state stores.
- [docs/](file:///c:/Others/proj/New_Portfolio/docs/): Project documentation.
- [supabase_schema.sql](file:///c:/Others/proj/New_Portfolio/supabase_schema.sql): Database schema.

## Key Concepts
- **CMS**: Content Management System for portfolio data.
- **No-Backend (Optional)**: Can run with localStorage, but Supabase is recommended for persistence.
- **Admin Dashboard**: secure area to manage content.
- **Internationalization**: Support for multiple languages.
